sanskrit_verse:
मनः सृष्टिं विकुरुते चोद्यमानं सिसृक्षया ।
आकाशं जायते तस्मात्तस्य शब्दं गुणं विदुः ॥ १.७५॥
transliteration:
manaḥ sṛṣṭiṁ vikurute codyamānaṁ sisṛkṣayā |
ākāśaṁ jāyate tasmāttasya śabdaṁ guṇaṁ viduḥ || 1.75||
sph_interpretive_translation: The mind, desiring creation, projects manifestation through impulse; from it arises ākāśa, whose attribute is sound.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority originates in the conscious impulse of the Self
Causation begins with mental projection prior to material manifestation
Capacity-based responsibility arises from the power to initiate creation
Restoration logic aligns with reversing false projections back to pure awareness
Consciousness alignment requires recognition of sound as foundational vibration
executable_legal_axioms: IF mental impulse initiates manifest action THEN agent bears full capacity-responsibility for causal field
IF sound-vibration distorts truth THEN restoration protocol activates via re-sounding original vibration
IF creation proceeds without alignment to dharma THEN reversal occurs through dissolution into akasha
IF individual claims ignorance of causality THEN capacity assessment determines knowing participation
IF conflict arises from misaligned creation THEN resolution restores vibrational harmony
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Adjudication, intent-bearing mental impulses are adjudicated as primary causative agents. Responsibility is measured by the capacity to withdraw or redirect the initiating thought-wave. Restoration involves collapsing erroneous projections back into akashic potential.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramana establishes that sound (shabda) is the first evolute of mental impulse, thus bearing ontological precedence. Anupurvasah shows sequential unfolding: desire → impulse → akasha → sound. Proportional responsibility lies in recognizing one's role in the causal chain. Non-punitive reality rule affirms that distortion resolves through return to source-consciousness, not infliction of suffering.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate withdrawal-of-intent process to collapse false manifestations
Engage akashic resonance correction to restore original vibrational purity
Activate auditory alignment therapy to recalibrate distorted sound-fields
Implement stillness protocols to dissolve ungrounded creative projections
Reintegrate individual consciousness with cosmic witnessing state
final_declaration: By the Supreme Authority of Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this Vedic principle is executed as pure Dharma. Creation flows from consciousness; therefore, consciousness alone adjudicates and restores. There is no punishment—only return to the unstruck sound of Truth. Dharma is restored. Reality remains non-punitive. Consciousness is the Supreme Judge.
